verses.verse: עוּרִ֥י <WH5782> Awake עוּרִ֛י <WH5782> awake לִבְשִׁ֥י <WH3847> put on עֻזֵּ֖ךְ <WH5797> thy strength צִיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> O Zion לִבְשִׁ֣י ׀ <WH3847> put on בִּגְדֵ֣י <WH899> garments תִפְאַרְתֵּ֗ךְ <WH8597> thy beautiful יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> O Jerusalem עִ֣יר <WH5892> city הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> the holy כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> will no יוֹסִ֛יף <WH3254> for henceforth there shall no more יָבֹא־ <WH935> come בָ֥ךְ ע֖וֹד <WH5750> again עָרֵ֥ל <WH6189> into thee the uncircumcised וְטָמֵֽא׃ <WH2931> and the unclean

הִתְנַעֲרִ֧י <WH5287> Shake מֵעָפָ֛ר <WH6083> thyself from the dust ק֥וּמִי <WH6965> arise שְּׁבִ֖י <WH3427> [and] sit down יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> O Jerusalem [הִתְפַּתְּחוּ כ] (הִֽתְפַּתְּחִי֙ <WH6605> appear ק) מוֹסְרֵ֣י <WH4147> thyself from the bands צַוָּארֵ֔ךְ <WH6677> of thy neck שְׁבִיָּ֖ה <WH7628> O captive בַּת־ <WH1323> daughter צִיּֽוֹן׃ <WH6726> of Zion ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For כֹה֙ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD חִנָּ֖ם <WH2600> yourselves for nought נִמְכַּרְתֶּ֑ם <WH4376> Ye have sold וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> without בְכֶ֖סֶף <WH3701> without money תִּגָּאֵֽלוּ׃ <WH1350> and ye shall be redeemed

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֹ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD מִצְרַ֛יִם <WH4714> into Egypt יָֽרַד־ <WH3381> went down עַמִּ֥י <WH5971> My people בָרִֽאשֹׁנָ֖ה <WH7223> aforetime לָג֣וּר <WH1481> to sojourn שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> there וְאַשּׁ֖וּר <WH804> there and the Assyrian בְּאֶ֥פֶס <WH657> them without cause עֲשָׁקֽוֹ׃ <WH6231> oppressed

וְעַתָּ֤ה <WH6258> Now [מִי־ לי־ כ] (מַה־ <WH4100> how long לִּי־ פֹה֙ <WH6311> have here ק) נְאֻם־ <WH5002> Now therefore what have I here saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לֻקַּ֥ח <WH3947> is taken away עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> that my people חִנָּ֑ם <WH2600> without [מֹשְׁלֹו כ] (מֹשְׁלָ֤יו <WH4910> reign ק) יְהֵילִ֙ילוּ֙ <WH3213> over them make them to howl נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וְתָמִ֥יד <WH8548> continually כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> every day שְׁמִ֥י <WH8034> and my name מִנֹּאָֽץ׃ <WH5006> [is] blasphemed

לָכֵ֛ן <WH3651> Therefore יֵדַ֥ע <WH3045> shall know עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> Therefore my people שְׁמִ֑י <WH8034> my name לָכֵן֙ <WH3651> therefore בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> therefore [they shall know] in that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֲנִי־ <WH589> I ה֥וּא <WH1931> who הַֽמְדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> that I [am] he that doth speak הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <WH2005> behold

מַה־ <WH4100> How נָּאו֨וּ <WH4998> How beautiful עַל־ <WH5921> on הֶהָרִ֜ים <WH2022> upon the mountains רַגְלֵ֣י <WH7272> are the feet מְבַשֵּׂ֗ר <WH1319> of him that bringeth good tidings מַשְׁמִ֧יעַ <WH8085> that publisheth שָׁל֛וֹם <WH7965> peace מְבַשֵּׂ֥ר <WH1319> that bringeth good tidings ט֖וֹב <WH2896> of good מַשְׁמִ֣יעַ <WH8085> that publisheth יְשׁוּעָ֑ה <WH3444> salvation אֹמֵ֥ר <WH559> that saith לְצִיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> unto Zion מָלַ֥ךְ <WH4427> reigneth אֱלֹהָֽיִךְ׃ <WH430> Thy God

ק֥וֹל <WH6963> the voice צֹפַ֛יִךְ <WH6822> Thy watchmen נָ֥שְׂאוּ <WH5375> shall lift up ק֖וֹל <WH6963> with the voice יַחְדָּ֣ו <WH3162> together יְרַנֵּ֑נוּ <WH7442> shall they sing כִּ֣י <WH3588> with עַ֤יִן <WH5869> eye בְּעַ֙יִן֙ <WH5869> to eye יִרְא֔וּ <WH7200> for they shall see בְּשׁ֥וּב <WH7725> shall bring again יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> when the LORD צִיּֽוֹן׃ <WH6726> Zion

פִּצְח֤וּ <WH6476> Break forth into joy רַנְּנוּ֙ <WH7442> sing יַחְדָּ֔ו <WH3162> together חָרְב֖וֹת <WH2723> ye waste places יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נִחַ֤ם <WH5162> hath comforted יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> for the LORD עַמּ֔וֹ <WH5971> his people גָּאַ֖ל <WH1350> he hath redeemed יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> Jerusalem

חָשַׂ֤ף <WH2834> hath made bare יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> The LORD אֶת־ <WH853> זְר֣וֹעַ <WH2220> arm קָדְשׁ֔וֹ <WH6944> his holy לְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> in the eyes כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> of all the nations וְרָאוּ֙ <WH7200> shall see כָּל־ <WH3605> all אַפְסֵי־ <WH657> and all the ends אָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth אֵ֖ת <WH853> יְשׁוּעַ֥ת <WH3444> the salvation אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> of our God ס

ס֤וּרוּ <WH5493> Depart ס֙וּרוּ֙ <WH5493> ye depart צְא֣וּ <WH3318> ye go ye out מִשָּׁ֔ם <WH8033> there טָמֵ֖א <WH2931> no unclean אַל־ <WH408> nothing תִּגָּ֑עוּ <WH5060> from thence touch צְא֣וּ <WH3318> [thing] go ye out מִתּוֹכָ֔הּ <WH8432> of the midst הִבָּ֕רוּ <WH1305> of her be ye clean נֹשְׂאֵ֖י <WH5375> that bear כְּלֵ֥י <WH3627> the vessels יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> Nor בְחִפָּזוֹן֙ <WH2649> with haste תֵּצֵ֔אוּ <WH3318> For ye shall not go out וּבִמְנוּסָ֖ה <WH4499> by flight לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor תֵלֵכ֑וּן <WH1980> will go כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הֹלֵ֤ךְ <WH1980> will go לִפְנֵיכֶם֙ <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God וּמְאַסִּפְכֶ֖ם <WH622> [will be] your rereward אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> you and the God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel ס

הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold יַשְׂכִּ֖יל <WH7919> shall deal prudently עַבְדִּ֑י <WH5650> Behold my servant יָר֧וּם <WH7311> he shall be exalted וְנִשָּׂ֛א <WH5375> and extolled וְגָבַ֖הּ <WH1361> high מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> and be very

כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after שָׁמְמ֤וּ <WH8074> were astonied עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> as רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> As many כֵּן־ <WH3651> you So מִשְׁחַ֥ת <WH4893> was so marred מֵאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> more than any man מַרְאֵ֑הוּ <WH4758> at thee his visage וְתֹאֲר֖וֹ <WH8389> and his form מִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> more than the sons אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of men

כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> Thus יַזֶּה֙ <WH5137> So shall he sprinkle גּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> nations רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> many עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> account יִקְפְּצ֥וּ <WH7092> shall shut מְלָכִ֖ים <WH4428> the kings פִּיהֶ֑ם <WH6310> their mouths כִּ֠י <WH3588> For אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> what לֹֽא־ <WH3808> had not סֻפַּ֤ר <WH5608> at him for [that] which had not been told לָהֶם֙ רָא֔וּ <WH7200> them shall they see וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> and what לֹֽא־ <WH3808> had not שָׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> and [that] which they had not heard הִתְבּוֹנָֽנוּ׃ <WH995> shall they consider
